name: AppStudio Project
summary: Learn about .NSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can drag-and-drop a variety of functions from the toolbox provided with the application. You can add images, lines, NavBars, buttons, FooterBars, TextBoxes, sliders, and more.
NOTE: You can create an NSX file by selecting File → New Project and then select Save Project As.... You can open an NSX file by selecting File → Open Project....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
